name: tootsie
content:
tootsie noun [C]
(FOOT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
child's word (also tootsy) a toe or a foot: Don't get your tootsies cold.

tootsie noun [C]
(WOMAN)
mainly US old-fashioned informal (also toots) a way of referring to or addressing a woman
